name: amplivar-blat
title: Amplivar-Blat
summary: v1.1 - Amplivar complexity reduction with Blat alignment

inputSpec.name: fastqs
inputSpec.label: Reads
inputSpec.help: A file, in gzipped FASTQ format, with the reads to be mapped (or the left reads, for paired pairs).

inputSpec.name: usual_suspects
inputSpec.label: usual suspects
inputSpec.help: A text file containing known variants used to create a count for the number of reads containing wildtype and mutant alleles

inputSpec.name: amplicon-flank
inputSpec.label: amplicon probes/flanking seq
inputSpec.help: A text file containing the flanking sequence of each amplicon. Required for complexity reduction

inputSpec.name: minfreq
inputSpec.label: minfreq
inputSpec.help: Minimum reported variant frequency. If blank default=5.

inputSpec.name: mincov
inputSpec.label: mincov
inputSpec.help: Minimum coverage for variant calling. Default=10

inputSpec.name: mincovvar
inputSpec.label: mincovvar
inputSpec.help: Minimum number reads containing the variant allele. Default=5

outputSpec.name: bams
outputSpec.label: inflated bamfiles, omitting index file
outputSpec.help: inflated bamfiles to be passed on to variant callers, does not include index file.

outputSpec.name: coverage_rpt
outputSpec.label: Coverage report summerising low coverage amplicons
outputSpec.help: Report summerising the coverage observed per sample

outputSpec.name: coverage_tally
outputSpec.label: All amplicons covereage tally
outputSpec.help: Tally of the reads observed for each amplicon
